ygData.subject: Re: Highpass Faction(was: najena faction)
ygData.msgSnippet: not sure exactly, they were blue the first time i went to HH at lv30. i estimate they are high 20 s since they max hit for about 70. probably about 28/29.
ygData.messageBody:
not sure exactly, they were blue the first time i went to HH at lv30. i
estimate they are high 20's since they max hit for about 70. probably about
28/29. great alternative to the overcamped guards in the commons.

kg
